price: مگر كسى كه الله [بر او] رحم كند كه او تعالی شکست‌ناپذیرِ مهربان است.
arabic: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: illā man raḥima al-lahu innahu huwa al-ʿazīzu al-raḥīmu
